title: KeyErrors in NovaException message format during unit test runs

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/158993
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=d336935cc1f4804bfa6af70012809e974e1fbaa2
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit d336935cc1f4804bfa6af70012809e974e1fbaa2
Author: Matt Riedemann <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Feb 24 20:57:24 2015 -0800

    Fix KeyErrors from incorrectly formatted NovaExceptions in unit tests
    
    When testr runs it dumps out stacktraces for KeyError when formatting
    NovaException messages with missing kwargs. This fixes the incorrect
    testing exceptions.
    
    To verify the changes, set fatal_exception_format_errors=True.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1425343
    
    Change-Id: I31de1f98e842cf9cad3a6b93313eb43b658b23d5
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
